scripts.start:docker: npm run start:arium; npm run start:vda; npm run start:prince
scripts.start:arium: docker exec -d arium_cli bash -c 'cd /etc/hyperledger/contract; npm rebuild; pkill -9 node; ./node_modules/concurrently/bin/concurrently.js "npm run build:watch" "npm run dev:watch:arium"'
scripts.start:vda: docker exec -d vda_cli bash -c 'cd /etc/hyperledger/contract; npm rebuild; pkill -9 node; ./node_modules/concurrently/bin/concurrently.js "npm run build:watch" "npm run dev:watch:vda"'
scripts.start:prince: docker exec -d princeinsurance_cli bash -c 'cd /etc/hyperledger/contract; npm rebuild; pkill -9 node; ./node_modules/concurrently/bin/concurrently.js "npm run build:watch" "npm run dev:watch:prince"'
